channel.title: Audio output devices not detected - Help
channel.description: I just installed Kicksecure but I can't get sound, not even when I plug in headphones to the audio jack. The Volume Control doesn't show any output devices besides the dummy output but my laptop's speakers worked with Windows and the monitor that it's plugged into via HDMI also has speakers which have been tested working with Qubes OS 4.2 and Fedora Workstation 41. How can I get the audio to work? Any help is much appreciated!

item.title: Audio output devices not detected - Help
item.dc:creator: paramount9
item.description:
I just installed Kicksecure but I can’t get sound, not even when I plug in headphones to the audio jack. The Volume Control doesn’t show any output devices besides the dummy output but my laptop’s speakers worked with Windows and the monitor that it’s plugged into via HDMI also has speakers which have been tested working with Qubes OS 4.2 and Fedora Workstation 41. How can I get the audio to work? Any help is much appreciated!

Read full topic
item.source: Audio output devices not detected - Help
